article_node.title: Clearway Energy, Inc. Declares $100,000,000 At-The-Market (ATM) Equity Offering Program
article_node.summary: Clearway Energy, Inc. (NYSE:CWEN) has launched a $100 million at‑the‑market equity offering, partnering with major banks to sell Class C shares at NYSE pricing. Proceeds will fund capital expenditures, acquisitions, debt repayment and general corporate needs. The program, governed by a prospectus supplement dated August 6 2025, positions CWEN—an owner of 12 GW of renewable and dispatchable generation—as a top green stock favored by hedge funds.
